page.title: 07Riding Of The Marches
page.content: {Annan Riding Of The Marches}has been going strong since the 1930's. It is hoped that it will carry on going strong in the years ahead of us. The talent contest which is held each year in the Victoria Hall is full of excitement. There are lots of ride outs before Riding of the Marches Day. At the Riding Of The Marches there is usually a band on the big stage. Down the High Street the horses gallop round the town boundaries until they stop for a rest. If you hold a horse you are given a ticket and with the ticket you can get a packet of crisps and a bottle of lemonade. Annan majorettes are going on stage for the crowning of the Queen Of The Border. It is on the 24.6.85.The queen is usually a pupil of Annan Academy. Riding Of The Marches Day is always the first Saturday in July.
